name: accept-md
description: Serve markdown representations of Next.js pages via Accept: text/markdown. Accept-md is a middleware that converts HTML pages to Markdown, which can be useful for SEO, API access, and other use cases.

scripts.release: pnpm run build && pnpm run publish:packages
scripts.publish:packages: pnpm --filter '@accept-md/core' publish --no-git-checks --access public && pnpm --filter 'accept-md-runtime' publish --no-git-checks --access public && pnpm --filter './packages/cli' publish --no-git-checks --access public
scripts.publish:dry-run: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter '@accept-md/core' publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter 'accept-md-runtime' publish --dry-run --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter './packages/cli' publish --dry-run --no-git-checks
